# seam

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/ecklab/seam/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ecklab/seam/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of {seam} is to implement SEAM methodology in `R`.

## Installation

Because this package is currently in a private repo, the easiest way to install the package is locally. After cloning the repo, use:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_local(force = TRUE)
```
